subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With their new boss looking on, Xavier Nady, Jeff Baker and Aramis Ramirez homered for the Cubs in their home opener, a 9-5 victory against the Brewers.
snippet: With their new boss looking on, Xavier Nady, Jeff Baker and Aramis Ramirez homered for the Cubs in their home opener, a 9-5 victory against the Brewers.
